scripts.db:delete:docker-container-volume: echo 'Checking Supabase status...' && (docker ps -q --filter "name=supabase_*_nsc-events-expo-supabase" > /dev/null && echo 'Stopping running Supabase containers...' && supabase stop --no-backup || echo 'No running Supabase containers found') && echo 'Removing any existing Supabase containers...' && (docker ps -a -q --filter "name=supabase_*_nsc-events-expo-supabase" | xargs -r docker rm -f || echo 'No containers to remove') && echo 'Removing any existing Supabase volumes...' && (docker volume ls -q --filter "label=com.supabase.cli.project=nsc-events-expo-supabase" | xargs -r docker volume rm || echo 'No volumes to remove') && echo 'Container and Volume cleanup completed successfully'
